name: Wizard VS Skeletons
description:
Description:

In this short game you have to fight off skeletons and improve your staff.

History: 

Long ago, when the grass was greener and the sky higher, there was the kingdom of Earlstone. Good people lived in it, and a wise king ruled them. Everyone lived happily. Until an evil Necromancer appeared on the lands of the kingdom. He wanted to capture it with the Life Crystal. Once, with the help of this crystal, the king created this kingdom. And one fateful night, the Necromancer with his skeletons attacked Earlstone. The king realized that if the sorcerer got the crystal, the kingdom would fall. And therefore, he entrusted you, the chief Archmage, with a difficult burden. Save the crystal and defeat the Necromancer. Prepare for battle wizard, and may the force be with you!

Control:

Very simple

WASD - move, Left mouse button - fire
